title: 266: Sex Confessions!
itunes:title: 266: Sex Confessions!
description:
It’s time for The Broads to go over some of the #broadsquad’s sexy and wild intimate confessions and Bekah and Jess own up to a lot of their own sex confessions themselves…and of course they get a little tangential! 


***Join The Bros Friday for their recap on Bachelorette Katie’s first episode!
